snippet.title: Pirate 101 - Debut Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the first trailer for Battle Pirates, the follow-up to the hugely successful family-friendly MMO, Wizard 101!

Subscribe to IGN's channel for the latest reviews, trailers, and walkthroughs: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=ignentertainment
